```{r}
library("septimanr")
library("tidyverse")
```


```{r}
data_nam <-
  data_discrete %>%
  mutate_decompose_date(week_style = "nam") %>%
  print(width = 200)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data_nam) + 
  geom_tile(
    aes(x = .week, y = .wday, 
        width = 0.925, height = 0.9, 
        fill = observation)
  ) + 
  scale_y_reverse() + 
  coord_fixed() +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_grid(.year ~ .)
```

It's clear that we have a problem with the method for assigning weeks in the `"nam"` style.
